name: Play-Don't
description:
Buy toys to defend yourself from the impending spread of the Clay-Dough!

Click or Tap on icons to buy toys, they will appear on the coffee table where you can drag them to the desired location. There are 3 different tiers you unlock throughout the waves. You start at pirate toys, at wave 3 you unlock army toys, and at wave 5 you unlock alien toys. Survive 7 waves to stop the spread!

Tower defense game, works on Mobile as well as on PC.

Game was created using Construct 3 on an iPhone

Thank you!

P.S. I’m aware of the rapid inflation that occurs and game gets game-breakingly easy after Alien tier is unlocked. I wasn’t able to figure out how to balance it properly as it was the first time I’ve made a game like this.
